metaData.title: Rosia Montana | accommodation | hikes | bike | trails
metaData.text: Accommodation in a restored heritage house from the Historic Center. Hiking or bike trails along the roman galleries, gold mining areas, patrimony buildings, mountains, lakes. Rent bikes or guided tours. At the end of the day read a book from our library in the hammock. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania, Romania.

carousel.title: Casa Petri - an unique place in Rosia Montana

content.text:
Discover an unique cultural heritage built by various civilizations since antiquity to extract gold (proposed as UNESCO site)
Nature and serenity - all around us are massifs, lakes and protected natural areas great for hiking or cycling.
See the existing open pits and how could impact a new one with cyanide like the one proposed by canadians.
We restored our grandparents house from the historic center of Roșia Montană, the place where the old miners changed the gold with money and dynamite). We restore it and now we offer

linkImageText.title: Books house
linkImageText.text: In the past here was a bank with one meter wide stone walls transformed in a space with a library, bath and kitchenette

linkImageText.title: Tarnat house
linkImageText.text: Here are the guests rooms of the household with 100years old painting, mineral and textiles exhibits plus a library with old books.

linkImageText.title: Little house
linkImageText.text: This place was the old summer house, the place where traditional foods and drinks were made. See here more...

heading.title: Hop on a tour of our area

linkImageBigText.text: Our area has unique historic and natural objectives, we know our soundings and what can you do and visit here. See here details about the guided tours that we offer in our area.

heading.title: Enjoy the nature and fresh air

linkImageText.title: Hiking
linkImageText.text: Have a walk towards the massive from our area to see the natural objectives. Marked hiking trails starts from the historic center.

linkImageText.title: Bike rides
linkImageText.text: We live in an area surrounded by hills, valleys and mountain villages connected with unpaved paths perfect for mountain bikes. We also rent bikes!

linkImageText.title: Discover the lakes
linkImageText.text: The lakes, relaxing and calm places perfect to catch an amazing sunset or to have a break from you hike.

linkImageText.title: Raspberry, Strawberry?
linkImageText.text: Depending upon the season, our area has various goodies directly from the source. Around will find  raspberry, strawberry, blackberry, mushrooms...

linkImageText.title: Visit the daffodils meadow
linkImageText.text: In the May weekends we organize visits to a magical place from our area with amazing landscapes and unforgettable smell: 'The daffodils meadow'

linkImageText.title: Live as a local farmer
linkImageText.text: Live in the nature. We put you in touch with local farms where you can learn a traditional job (haymaking, hand cow milking...

linkImageText.title: Historic center
linkImageText.text: Have a walk in the historic center of the oldest attested locality from Romania (Rosia Montană, year 131) to discover the heritage buildings

linkImageText.title: Goldsmith stories
linkImageText.text: At the museums you can see the gold processing techniques evolution, tools and mining machines, golden veins and galleries.

linkImageText.title: Mining galleries
linkImageText.text: Discover the marks of our ancestors: the mining galleries (romans, preromans or hamburgs) proposed to become an UNESCO site

linkImageText.title: Hay covered houses
linkImageText.text: A tour of the houses and stables covered with hay and of the small wooden churches specific to our area is like a journey back in time.

linkImageText.title: Communism Period
linkImageText.text: Discover the megaprojects of the communism period, open pits and wasting lakes. Geamăna. Roșia Poieni. Cetate.

heading.title: How to reach us?

content.text: We are in the historic center of Roșia Montană, 331A, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania. To reach us set on gps 'Casa Petri Rosia Montana'.
